name: CandyShop
description:
H@e..l*lo kids, if you really have the courage to nock on my door at Halloween, the you have the right to enter my Candy Shop... Who I am? My name is Fred, the owner of the Tower Of Death. I have only One Rule: Don´t lose your Candy..  WA..Ga..Haa..Ha...Haaaaa
